name: Happy Santa Go Go Go
description:
Description :

Christmas night is magic for all the children of the world. Santa needs you to pick up all the presents he's going to give. With the help of his companions, you will try to recover as many gifts as possible. Run in the snow in this moonlit night forest. The snowmen will encourage you to jump well between each obstacle.

Game controls : 

Use the mouse or touch the screen to jump.

Play Chistmast Games on Jeux-mini.com
